projects: [{"title":"Cricket Scorecard","description":"Developed a web scraper using Python and BeautifulSoup to extract live cricket scorecards from a popular cricket website.Applied HTML parsing techniques to navigate through the website's structure and retrieve the desired data.Implemented data cleaning and formatting operations to transform the scraped data into a structured format suitable for further analysis.Utilized the requests library to handle HTTP requests and responses for retrieving website data."},{"title":"Graph Editor Desktop Application","description":"* Devised a GUI using PyQt5 tools and Qt Designer for working with graph algorithms, including graph planarity check, maximum matching, minimum vertex cover, and maximum independent sets.* Developed button features and drag-and-drop options for edges, making the GUI user-friendly and easy to navigate.* Utilized the local file system for storage and retrieval of graphs in the GUI, ensuring efficient data management."},{"title":"Inventory Management system","description":"* Designed and developed an inventory management system using deep neural networks, utilizing three years of sales data from a restaurant to train and test the model.* Utilized programming languages such as Python and frameworks like TensorFlow and Keras to model the deep neural networks, achieving a model accuracy of above 88%.* Collaborated with team members to ensure the successful implementation of the inventory management system and to develop effective strategies for data preprocessing, feature selection, and model evaluation.* Employed techniques such as data visualization and statistical analysis to identify trends and patterns in the sales data, ensuring a comprehensive and accurate analysis."},{"title":"Statistical modelling and analysis of electricity consumption","description":"* Conducted statistical modeling and analysis of electricity consumption, proposing and implementing a prediction model to estimate consumption.* Developed the prediction model using various techniques, including Holt-Winters, ARIMA, SARIMA, Vector Autoregressive (VAR), and FBProphet models, to ensure accurate and reliable results.* Utilized programming languages such as Python and R to implement the models and analyze the data, ensuring a robust and efficient analysis pipeline."}]
